Class Staff

java.lang.Object
HW3.Staff
public class Staff extends Object
Represents a staff member who has administrative privileges to manage the platform, including reviewers, system settings, and monitoring activity.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class

    Represents a system activity log entry

  • Constructor Details

    • Staff

      public Staff(String username, String email, HW3.Reviews reviewsSystem)
      Creates a new staff member with the given username and email
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the staff member
      email - Email address of the staff member
      reviewsSystem - Reference to the Reviews system

  • Method Details

    • getAllReviewers

      public List<String> getAllReviewers()
      Gets a list of all reviewers in the system
      Returns:
      A list of all unique reviewer usernames

    • deleteReviewer

      public boolean deleteReviewer(String reviewerUsername)
      Deletes a reviewer account from the system by removing all their reviews
      Parameters:
      reviewerUsername - Username of the reviewer to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if any reviews were deleted, false otherwise

    • updateSystemSetting

      public void updateSystemSetting(String key, Object value)
      Updates a system setting with the given key and value
      Parameters:
      key - Name of the setting to update
      value - New value for the setting
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the key or value is null, or if the value is invalid for the setting

    • getSystemSetting

      public Object getSystemSetting(String key)
      Gets the value of a system setting
      Parameters:
      key - Name of the setting to retrieve
      Returns:
      The value of the setting, or null if the setting doesn't exist

    • getAllSystemSettings

      public Map<String,Object> getAllSystemSettings()
      Gets all system settings
      Returns:
      A map of all system settings

    • getActivityLogs

      public List<Staff.ActivityLog> getActivityLogs()
      Gets all activity logs in the system
      Returns:
      A list of all activity logs

    • getActivityLogsByDateRange

      public List<Staff.ActivityLog> getActivityLogsByDateRange(Date startDate, Date endDate)
      Gets activity logs within the specified date range
      Parameters:
      startDate - Start date for the range
      endDate - End date for the range
      Returns:
      A list of activity logs within the date range

    • demoteTrustedReviewer

      public boolean demoteTrustedReviewer(String reviewerUsername)
      Demotes a trusted reviewer to a regular reviewer
      Parameters:
      reviewerUsername - Username of the reviewer to demote
      Returns:
      true if the reviewer was successfully demoted, false if the reviewer wasn't found or wasn't trusted

    • promoteTrustedReviewer

      public boolean promoteTrustedReviewer(String reviewerUsername)
      Adds a reviewer to the trusted reviewers list
      Parameters:
      reviewerUsername - Username of the reviewer to promote
      Returns:
      true if the reviewer was added, false if they were already trusted

    • isReviewerTrusted

      public boolean isReviewerTrusted(String reviewerUsername)
      Checks if a reviewer is trusted
      Parameters:
      reviewerUsername - Username of the reviewer to check
      Returns:
      true if the reviewer is trusted, false otherwise

    • getTrustedReviewers

      public List<String> getTrustedReviewers()
      Gets all trusted reviewers
      Returns:
      A list of trusted reviewer usernames
